HealthcarePayerNetwork.name: HealthcarePayerNetwork
HealthcarePayerNetwork.description: Represents an insurance network group. For example, an insurance company’s exclusive provider organization (EPO) plans.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date from which this payer network is effective.

EffectiveTo.description: The date on which this payer network is no longer effective.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the record is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LineofBusiness.description: Specifies the line of business supported by this payer network.

NetworkType.description: Type of network, such as HMO, PPO, or EPO.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ParentPayerNetworkId.description: The parent healthcare payer network associated with this payer network.

PayerId.description: The account associated with the payer network.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of an external record on its source system.
